articles.title: CNN Kicks Off 2026 with Best Month Since 2024 Presidential Election
articles.summary: Ratings January 28th, 2026 CNN Kicks Off 2026 with Best Month Since 2024 Presidential Election as Breaking News Draws Multiplatform Audiences Best Start of the Year Since 2023 on TV Among Both Demos Largest Jump in Streaming Subscribers on Record Best Weekend Total Day Performance Since June 2025 Double-Digit Year-Over-Year Growth Across TV Dayparts and Shows Most Watched Primetime Month Since November 2024 Election; Key Demo Audience Nearly Doub

articles.title: South Africa : Extreme Heat Exposes Health Risks for Schoolchildren
articles.summary: As Durban temperatures reached 30 degrees this week, one school resorted to holding classes outside. 'Our classrooms are unbearably hot, and young children simply cannot cope. That is why photographs show learners seated outdoors while lessons continue,' says Neil Blankenberg, principal of Assegai Primary School in Wentworth. In December, a 5-year-old pupil fainted in class due to soaring classroom temperatures. This is not an isolated incident.

articles.title: Russia 1 . 2 million casualties in Ukraine dwarf all its conflicts since World W
articles.summary: Volunteer Jan Artyukhov inspects a destroyed Russian tank in the field near the town of Derhachi, Kharkiv region, on October 1, 2023. Sergey Bobok/AFP/Getty Images Russia War in Ukraine See all topics Facebook Tweet Email Link Link Copied! Follow About 1.2 million Russian troops have been killed, wounded or are missing since its invasion of Ukrain e almost four years ago, a rate of casualties for a major military power not seen since World War II

articles.title: Nearly 2 million military casualties in Ukraine war , reports finds
articles.summary: News World Europe Russia suffers heaviest losses since WWII as casualties in Ukraine conflict near 2 million The report said Russia suffered 1.2 million casualties, including up to 325,000 troop deaths, between February 2022 and December 2025 Maira Butt Thursday 29 January 2026 04:00 GMT Bookmark Comments Go to comments Bookmark popover Removed from bookmarks Close popover Carriages burn following deadly Russian drone attack on Ukraine passenger
